verses.roman:
tṛtīya divase prabhu tāṅra dvāre yāñā
'uṭhaha' paṇḍita'--kari' kahena ḍākiyā

synonyms: tṛtīya divase—on the third day; prabhu—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; tāṅra—of Jagadānanda Paṇḍita; dvāre—to the door; yāñā—going; uṭhaha'-please get up; paṇḍita—My dear Jagadānanda Paṇḍita; kari'-saying; kahena—said; ḍākiyā—calling.
translation: Three days later, Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu went to the door of his room and said, "My dear Jagadānanda Paṇḍita, please get up.
